description: Yet Another Olauncher Fork, But With All Apps Hidden Yet another Olauncher Fork where apps are invisible by default, you only need to type which apps you want to open. It should reduce your screen time from opening apps you didn't plan on opening. Would recommend using a grey or black wallpaper (for immersion?, idk just recommending) FEATURES * No ads * FOSS forever * Clean, fast and lightweight HOW TO USE * Swipe up to see all the apps and quick search * Swipe down for notification drawer * Long press home apps to change them * Important: Long press on empty space to open settings Once you open the settings, you'll see all the available options. So basically, swipe and long press anywhere and you'll be fine.
